titleStmt.title: The fountain of life, or life in its derivation from Christ. In a sermon preached at the funeral of that honoured lady, the Lady Jane Reade, the relict of Sir John Reade, (sometimes whil'st he lived) of Sorangle in Lincolnshire, knight. By Edmund Pinchbeck, B.D.
titleStmt.author: [Pinchbeck, Edmund].

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.R. & E.M. for Humfrey Tuckey, at the black-spread Eagle in Fleetstreet, over against St. Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The fountain of life, or life in its derivation from Christ.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
